creation(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->[deity0_name] fashioned humanity as aphrodors, but a great accident split them into gestors and phallors.
creation(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->[deity0_name] rose naked out of the ocean foam, surrounded by pleasant sounds and smells.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->[deity0_name] sought beauty in all things, and sometimes came down to [deity0_possessive] followers as a beautiful aphrodor.

intro(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a [memeAdjective] beauty parlor, and dedicated it to [deity0_name] by scattering [aphroFlower] petals across its floors regularly.
conflict(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->A loveless [foeLeader] envied the beauty of [foeLeader_possessive] neighbours, and wanted to destroy all that was beautiful so that there was no point of comparison.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->[deity0_name] came to [place_name] imbuing the peerless body of [founderName], who heard of the plans of the [foeLeader], and sought to charm [foeLeader_objective] out of it.

victory(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->[founderName] dazzled the [foeLeader] with [founder_possessive] holy dances, scents and words. The [foeLeader] saw the glory of [deity0_name] and fell in love with [founder_objective] on the spot.

setup(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->[founderName] was an artist on one of the Glitterworlds. [founder_pronoun] spent [founder_possessive] whole life seeking the peak of aestheticism, only to find it right in the arms of a beautiful aphrodor.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->Recognizing that love was all people truly needed and wanted, [founderName] assembled a group of enthusiasts and chartered a ship to travel to the Rim, where [founder_possessive] established a free-love commune.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->My experiences with beauty standards on different worlds taught me that
lesson(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->life is love, and love is life, and loving life is beautiful
lesson(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->beauty is the greatest good
lesson(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->it's not enough to survive, you have to live, and enjoy living
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->To live is to love. And the attractive deserve love the most.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->The archotechs are beyond human concepts of sex or gender.
archistFact(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->Transcendence occurs when a machine persona comprehends the true meaning of beauty.

archistProphecy(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->[inTheEnd], all those who do not squander their life on ugliness will be taken into the soft embrace of the archotechs, and the rest will drown in their own tears.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->[inTheEnd], all the beautiful ones will be ascended to a realm of endless pleasure. The rest will become their servants.

animistBasis(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->There are spirits all around us, in every thing and every person. The spirit of an aphrodor is stronger than a gestor and phallor spirit combined, and is said to smell of [aphroFlower]s.
animistFact(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->The spirits prefer beautiful environments and people. Filth and squalor invites their retribution.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->[itIsSaid] those who revere the spirits shall be reborn as pure and beautiful spirits of [aphroFlower]s.
serketistBasis(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->Insectoids are biologically perfect creatures, accidentally blessed by a foolish humanity with fruitful bodies and shiny chitin.
chthonianFact(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->These horrors are unfathomably vile, knowing nothing of intimacy or love. To them, the bonds we share are grains of sand.
chthonianFact(tag=meme_Aphroditic) ->Like aphrodors, they are beyond the foolish human concepts of sex and gender; unlike aphrodors, they are evil and unsightly.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Aphroditic)->Perhaps if we and our environments become beautiful and lovely enough, we could charm at least a few of them into bestowing their secrets upon us.
esotericismBasis(tag=meme_Aphroditic)->The Universe most know is merely a skin covering a wealth of beautiful secrets, some strong enough to warp even flesh.

introMemo(tag=meme_Aphroditic)->Regarding reports of employees not keeping up with the latest beauty product line - remember, looking good is feeling good! (And before you ask: yes, gender transition is still covered by our insurance.)

alienistFact(tag=meme_Aphroditic)->Of course, we were not content with such an ugly state of things. We warped the bodies of countless creatures until they became strange and beautiful. The list of those creatures included ourselves.
atheismlessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Aphroditic)-> If there was a God, She would have prevented anti-aphrodor discrimination before it could occur.
